it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.attachedProperties

Class ProtectedProperty<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.attachedProperties.Property<V>
      • it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.attachedProperties.SimpleProperty<V>
        • it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.attachedProperties.ProtectedProperty<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - the type of the value hold by the property.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DelegatedProperty

    public class ProtectedProperty<V>
extends SimpleProperty<V>
    Properties created from this class can be written only by means of a secret in the form of an instance of ProtectedProperty.ValueSetter. A property can be paired with at most one setter and this can not be changed; if the setter is reused and paired with some other property, any previous pairing will be lost.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ProtectedProperty.ValueSetter<V>
      A secret used to set the value of a protected property.
